channel.title: CVE Feed for ENTTEC -- Datagate MK2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ENTTEC -- Datagate MK2

item.title: CVE-2019-6542|2024-08-04T20:23:21.439Z -- enttec -- datagate%20mk2
item.description: ENTTEC Datagate MK2, Storm 24, Pixelator all firmware versions prior to (70044,70050,70060)_update_05032019-482 allows an unauthenticated user to initiate a remote reboot, which may be used to cause a denial of service condition.
